response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both parties. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your experience. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
